revised_title: Studies on the Reactions and Compounds of Glycol
tldr: The author investigates various reactions and compounds involving glycol, including the preparation of chloracetine, the formation of butyroacetate of glycol, and the synthesis of chlorbenzoate of glycol. The author also explores the action of hydriodic acid on glycol, resulting in the formation of iodide of ethylene and iodhydrine of glycol.
